column1: length ball starts down leg side and swings further towards the right, but not enough. He can't get bat on it
length outside off with a hint of swing away again. Tapped into the off side
length ball on the pads, tickled to the keeper off the thigh
length ball on the pads, tickled to fine leg's left from the crease
length ball outside off, slanting across the stumps. Left alone
ends up at second slip! Yikes. That has slipped from Cottrell's hand and it's some early catching practice to his right for the slip fielder
top edge to fine leg and it's taken, but it won't stand of course. Nice bouncer steep at the chest and he couldn't swing cleanly with the hook from under this
full outswinger on middle stump, leans in and closes the face late on this to get it through midwicket
short of a length outswinger outside off, some shape away. Enough time to get on the back foot and nudge this to backward point
floaty length ball wide outside off. Left alone
length ball outside off, dead-batted into the covers
length ball on middle stump, stabbed back down the pitch from the crease
gets the back leg as this straightens after angling in at off stump. Some outswing. Anamul was looking to flick and had closed the face too early. That was going over off
short and wide outside off, lots of time again to free the arms and this time he punches it through cover
overpitched on the pads, stands tall and handsomely whips this through square leg. Fine leg has a lot of running to this right to get to this
full on leg stump, clips it off the front foot through the midwicket region
length ball outside off, left alone
short in the corridor, mistimed cut into the covers
length ball on middle stump, jabbed uppishly into the leg side from the crease. That stopped on him
length outside off, left alone
length on middle stump, closes the face and clips to midwicket
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length at middle stump, tapped down the pitch at the bowler
overpitched ball down leg side, can't get bat on the flick
length ball wide outside off, left alone
full on off stump, leans into it and taps it to mid-off's left to pinch a single
short of a length in the corridor, taps it into the off side from deep in the crease
length ball at middle stump, tapped to mid-on from the crease
short and wide outside off, late slice to backward point's right. Can't get it past him
length ball down leg side, head falls over into the off side as he stretches to flick this. Gets it wide of fine leg whose dive to the right is not quick enough
nicely done. Length ball outside off, leans in calmly as he punches this on the up. It bounces away wide of mid-off and teases the two fielders running after it before getting to the boundary
length at the stumps, tapped to midwicket off the front foot
length ball outside off, left alone
short of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
sound as this goes through to the keeper down leg side. It's a length ball on leg stump that he's trying to glance. Not out says the umpire. That was off the thigh guard.
length on leg stump, flicked to square leg's right
short of a length outside off, nudged to mid-on's right on the up
full outside off, blocked with soft hands to get a single to cover's left
short of a length outside off, tapped to cover off the back foot
overpitched and in at middle stump. A firm punch to mid-on
length ball on off stump, climbs up as he gets in for the defence. Manages to drop it into the pitch
falls safely after pinging off his glove. Short of a length ball on leg stump and he's hurried on the pull. It lobs up for the keeper to his right but is quite far away in the end
short of a length in the corridor, mistimed dab into the off side gives them the chance to pick up a single
length on middle stump, flicked to square leg's right
short of a length outside off, watchfully poked into the covers

clears mid-off and Tamim survives again. Steps out at this length ball outside off and has an ugly swipe while losing his shape. Powell picks it a second late and can't get close to it running backwards as it's sliced off the face of the bat
length on leg stump, clipped through square leg
length ball in the corridor, angled inwards. Gets forward and blocks
length ball in the corridor, solidly blocked on the front foot
offcutter a length on leg stump, deflected to fine leg's right off the front foot
short ball in the corridor, tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
mistimed pull as he looks to drag this from outside off. Short ball slanted across him is too quick for him
length ball outside off, pushed with soft hands into the off side and another single is stolen
length ball on leg stump, flicked to short fine's left
thuds the back leg as he looks to pull. Short of a length ball on leg stump and he's looking to go towards fine leg with this
length outside off, defended into the covers
length outside off, looks to push another one into the off side with soft hands. Can't get it off the pitch
length on off stump, gets forward and flicks to short midwicket
full ball just outside off, steps out and yorks himself. Manages to squeeze it to mid-off's right

taken at mid-on. Anamul's struggle ends. It's a a short ball rising steeply in the corridor and an ordinary attempt to hook. He's caught on the front foot and is completely cramped. Drags it into the hands of mid-on off the high part of the bat
full on middle stump, flicks to deep square's right
slower ball, full at middle stump. Has to check and tap with soft hands after shaping to flick
length in the corridor, pushed to point off the front foot
short of a length and coming in at leg stump. Gets on the back foot and glances to short fine
short of a length skidder hurries him in the corridor. Gets back and taps to short cover
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to deep backward square
short of a length slider outside off, punched down the pitch off the back foot
short of a length outside off, clipped to midwicket's left
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
pings him on the thumb with one that climbs up from a length. He's looking to flick this as it comes into him
glorious. Offers the full face this time. Length ball skidding in with the angle and he puts a stride forward to lift it straight over the bowler
short of a length at off stump, can't get this late cut past point and gully
nicely played again, but mid-off's dive will keep it to one. It's a length ball outside off and he gets a full swing through as he drives on the up. Powell leaps to his right and saves
now Keemo Paul to his right, pulls off a stunning save. Tamim walks across into the off side and pulls powerfully to deep square's right. Keemo sprints and stops it very late
steps out against a bounce that's outside off, he can't get bat on that
short and into his ribs. Gets on his toes and glances to fine leg
short of a length outside off, punched to long-on off the back foot
length ball on middle stump, swept with the turn to deep square
length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket's left off the back foot
full on middle stump, driven to long-on off the front foot

fingertip from Hetmyer who is flying to his right from midwicket. He can't get there though. Tamim doesn't get to the pitch of this middle stump ball as he looks to flick and it floats up and then gets down to long-on
short of a length on off stump, backs away and stabs into the off side
short ball in the corridor, chops it down to third man
launched over point with full control. Short and wide outside off and this is easy for Tamim. Slashes effectively from underneath
short on the hips, swivels and pulls between deep square and fine leg
cut uppishly towards third man. Short ball cramps him in the corridor
short and outside off. Caresses it towards third man but point sprints across to his right to stop this
short ball at the stumps. Pulled to deep square's right

is there bat on that? We'll find out with the review. Bishoo gets this to dip and turn in at Tamim, who is pressing forward with hard hands. It's lobbed off the pad, past the keeper's grasp and then been taken at slip. Was there bat before all of the action? There was a sound...but it was the sound of ball hitting forearm and sliding onto the pad. He's also struck outside off for the lbw decision. Not out. Review lost.
tossed up on a length at off stump, he shuffles across and winds up to swing. But is forced to tap with a straight bat
floated up at a length again, watchfully defended down the pitch
length ball sliding in at leg stump, flicked hurriedly to square lge
tossed up outside off, 74kph. Shuffles again and closes the face on this. Gets the flick to square leg
steps out and toe-ends it down the pitch after meeting it on the full. Bishoo fires in a throw after picking this up and makes him skip back into the crease
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's right off the toe-end
length outside off, flashy drive attempted on the up. Thick outside edge to third man's right
short and wide outside off, shapes to cut but this zips back into the corridor and climbs too as he tries to connect
length ball on middle stump, jabbed to mid-on on the rise
length on middle stump, driven on the rise to mid-on's right
short of a length outside off, mistimed cut to sweeper cover
short on middle stump, gets deep in the crease and pulls to deep midwicket
full toss outside off. A subdued drive that won't beat Holder's reach at mid-off. Shakib disappointed he didn't get that past
short of a length outside off, punched to long-off off the back foot
short ball sliding down leg side, gets back and deflects this towards deep backward square
tossed up at leg stump, flicked to square leg off the front foot
short of a length at off stump, gets deep in the crease and taps to sweeper cover off
length and angled into middle stump. Blocks it into the leg side with the angle
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
top edge lands safely to third man's right. It's a short ball in the corridor. It's another one of those down-the-track-ugly-heaves from Tamim. The fielder takes it on the bounce
shot. That is solid, the exact opposite of what happened last ball. Full on off stump, stays strong and punches firmly with the full face. Bisects bowler and mid-off
pulled to deep square's right. Short ball at the chest and it's pulled sweetly
short of a length outside off, opens the face and deflects to third man
falls short of Bishoo but he didn't get down quickly at this. Lobbed up at a length on middle stump and he's looking to drive. Chips it back to Bishoo's left
length on middle, flicked to midwicket
length ball pitches outside leg and spins further down as he looks to hoick
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
tossed up outside off, square drive to deep point
length outside off, shuffles across and swipes it between square leg and short fine. Nicely placed
length on off stump, pokes into the leg side with the turn
length ball skidding into leg stump. Hurriedly tapped to midwicket off the back foot
short ball skidding outside off. Narrowly misses the outside edge as he looks to cut
length on middle, blocked on the front foot
short of a length on middle stump, punched to mid-on off the back foot
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length on off stump, flicked to midwicket from deep in the crease
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the front foot
length skidder outside ff, doesn't get forward and just manages to get bat on this before it hits him on the pad
length on off stump, nudged through midwicket off the back foot
googly, length on middle stump. Leans in and flicks to midwicket's left
skidder keeps low outside off as Shakib opens up and shapes to punch. Just manages to keep it out
length outside off, a googly. Pushed with the turn square into the open point region
tossed up outside off, driven to long-off with the turn
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to midwicket's left off the back foot with the angle. That's another fifty for Tamim. Third time he's reached the mark this series
tossed up at off stump, driven to long-off
arm ball, back of a length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
full on off stump, jammed back down the pitch

length outside off, steps out and goes inside-out to sweeper's left. Bit of aerobics by Cottrell out there as he flicks it back into play before crossing the boundary. Recovers and puts the throw back in. A long sprint and a one-handed pick up before all this

survives on the catch and then Shakib survives a run out at the other end. He gets a leading edge as he looks to close the face and it lands between Gayle and extra cover. Bishoo is the fielder there and he can't hit the stumps as Shakib struggles to make his ground
length on leg stump, steps out and swipes off the inside half to midwicket
misfield after Tamim steps out and bludgeons this past Gayle. Holder at long-off is right there, but he let's it slip. Didn't even have a lot of running to do, that's poor.
length on middle, steps out and drives to long-on
length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
length ball, steps out and offers the pad
tossed up at leg stump, driven down to long-on
short of a length on off stump, gets back and clips through square leg
short of a length outside off, dabbed to short third off the outside half
tossed up on leg stump, driven to long-on off the front foot
short of a length flat one in the corridor. Defended to point off the back foot
full on off stump, driven with the turn to extra cover
full ball down leg side, can't get bat on the sweep
short of a length on middle stump, gets on the back foot and taps it to short fine's right
short ball outside off. Punched back firmly at the bowler, who deflects it towards long-on
length ball on the pads, slides in and deflects to short fine as he looks to flick
length on middle, steps out and slugs it out to deep midwicket off the inside half
length ball down leg side, left alone
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
length outside off, steps out and jams it into the pitch. On the bounce to extra cover
tossed up at off stump, driven on the bounce into the covers
full on leg stump, driven back to the bowler

top edge to deep square. It was coming. They were both getting restless, and it's Shakib who goes first. Length ball looped right up at middle stump. Looks to go for the big slog sweep and ends up getting a top-edge. It's how you got the oversized slogger out at high school level - toss it right up. Shakib, among the elite allrounders in the world, will not be happy with that
tossed up at a length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, pushed to point's right off the front foot
length in the corridor, clipped to midwicket off the back foot
yorker length outside off, jammed square into the off side
length ball pushed wide outside off, left alone
beaten. Gets a length ball to shape in marginally outside off and then gets it to rise away as he looks to drive through cover
length outside off, driven on the up to points who puts in a throw at the non-striker's end and Jason Holder misfields at mid-on
short ball down leg side, can't get bat on the pull
offcutter at a length on off stump. Drops it into the off side with soft hands but can't get the single
nice bouncer. Perfectly directed and viciously rising at his grille. But he does well to sway out of its way
creams it over long-on. Meets the length ball at the pitch outside off and swings cleanly to clear the fielder in the deep
full outside off, shuffles and drives to long-off
length ball pushed down leg side
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler on the bounce
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up on leg stump, shuffles and sweeps to short fine
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper
length ball on middle stump, stops on him as he looks to flick uppishly through leg side. Chips safely, wide of mid-on, in the end
over the long-off boundary. Lovely shot. Holds his shape and expertly launches this. That's class. It's a length ball outside off and he hits on the rise
short of a length outside off, opens the face and deflects towards point
cops it on the pad as he lifts his front leg to try and whip this short of a length ball at his hips
short outside off, drags it to mid-on with a pull
short of a length outside off. Opens the face and gets it down to third man
length on middle, clips to short fine from the crease
full on middle stump, flicked to long-on off the front foot
short of a length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
full on middle stump, driven to long-off
short of a length on middle stump, tapped back to the bowler on the bounce
full on off stump, can't get the drive past the bowler
back of a length on off, and worked off his hips to the leg side for a single. Dribbles away to fine leg
flat-batted down the ground! Length ball outside off, and Tamim gets his front leg out of the way and swings through the line of the ball
slower ball on leg stump, but too short to worry Tamim. Defended away
full outside off, but Tamim walks towards the delivery and hits a Gangulyesque drive through to deep extra cover
slower ball outside leg, and this time Tamim scoops this off his hips, and over square leg! Rolls into the boundary behind square
length ball on middle, and Tamim's mistimed pull goes straight to midwicket. Big over

got him! Mushfiqur was trying to do too much there. Short on middle, and Mushfiqur went down on one knee - outside off stump - to try and scoop it over fine leg. But he misses his swipe, and the ball turns away from him and crashes into leg stump. Soft, soft dismissal
full just outside off, and he defends with soft hands. Finds the bat's outside edge, but the ball sneaks betweek keeper and first slip. Gets off the mark with a streaky stroke
full outside off, and driven to deep extra cover for a single
wide outside off, and Tamim brings out the late dab past short fine leg
full on off, and that's been drilled down the ground to long on
full on middle, and Tamim has to take a big stride forward to defend
length ball on off, and spinning away. Tapped to the off side
full on off, and pushed down the ground to mid on
full on leg, and he turns this off his pads to short fine leg. Can't steal the single though
length ball on off, and Tamim rocks back to bring out the punch. Intercepted by Bishoo though
half-tracker on middle once more. Flicked away to square leg off the back foot
fuller on middle, but Tamim rocks back to clip it off his pads to deep square leg
stays low! Full outside off, but spinning further away, and Tamim misses the late cut

tossed up outside leg stump, and Tamim goes for the whip off his toes. He misses, and the keeper takes the bails off in a flash. Is he stumped?! His back foot was in the air, but he got it down before the bails came off. Just a wide then
full on off, and pushed with the angled bat to the fielder at deep point. A couple for Tamim
full on middle, and it's the one that goes straight through! Defended off the front foot
length ball on middle, and he plays a deft late cut straight to Lewis at short third man
full on off, and driven along the ground to the sweeper fielder on the extra-cover region
smartly played! Overpitched on middle, and Mahmudullah opens his bat's face and plays a paddle sweep past the keeper's right. Goes to the drinks break with a boundary
tossed up on off, and he flicks it away to midwicket
full just outside off, and worked away to square leg for a quick single
length ball, and he nudges it off his hips behind square on the leg side
full on leg stump, and that's been clipped off his toes to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
goes past the outside edge! Length ball outside off, and spinning away. Into Hope's gloves
length ball on middle, and defended away to point
good length outside off, and he punches this straight back to Nurse off the back foot
full on off, and that's been driven to the fielder at wide long on. Tamim on 91 now
full on leg stump, and that's been swept fine. But a diving effort from short fine leg stops the ball
length ball outside off, and angling across the batsman. Plays the cut past the infield for one
full on middle, and Tamim defends with the angled bat. The ball dribbles away to the leg side for one
length ball outside off again, and cut away sharply to the fielder in the deep
full outside off, and he pushes at this for a single. Goes to long off on this occasion
flat outside leg, and spinning down the leg side. Tamim happily lets it go
full on leg stump, and he's down on one knee! Slog sweeps over short fine leg, and the ball soars over the boundary for a maximum. He's on 98 now
full just outside leg, and he taps this to square leg. Moves on to 99*
length ball outside off, but spinning further away. Mahmudullah makes some extra room and then cuts to point
full on leg, and he works it away to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
full just outside off, and he defends towards the off side. Wants a single, but the ball's gone nowhere. He scampers back
full and wide, but the drive goes straight to the cover fielder
length ball on leg stump, and Mahmudullah punches this to cover point for a single. Gives Tamim the strike
full on middle, and driven to long off for a jogging single. Tamim's 11th ODI hundred. Mahmudullah congratulates his partner.
in the slot, and dispatched away! Full on off, and Mahmudullah backs away, takes a big backlift, and then smashes it over Nurse's head
good length on leg stump, and that's been worked off his pads to Gayle to deep midwicket. Played with such soft hands that they can come back for the second
overpitched on middle, and that's been shoveled to Gayle at short midwicket
full on middle, and Tamim goes to the off side to sweep very fine. Mistimes to short fine leg, but Tamim's in pain! Wonder if he pulled a muscle near his glutes
full toss on off, and Tamim drives firmly to deep extra cover for a couple
length ball on off, and that's been punched down the ground to long on
wide outside off, and enough time to cut it away to the fielder in the deep. Bangladesh's 200 too!

taken by square leg diving to his right! Full on middle, and Tamim tries to slog sweep behind square. Whips this away off his legs, but the ball doesn't get the elevation, and this time Tamim must walk back
welcomes him with the wrong'un. Length ball angling into the batsman, and he flicks it away to square leg for one
slower ball, on a length outside off. Mortaza's through his attempted punch too early, and the ball takes an inside edge to the keeper
short ball on middle, and that's been flicked to deep midwicket off his hips
yorker on middle, and he shovels this to long on for a single
back of a length on off, and he mistimes a pull over square leg for a single
back of a length on off, and he nudges it into the vacant midwicket region
full on leg stump, and he misses the flick. Hits his front leg, but the lbw appeal is turned down. Probably because it would've definitely gone down leg stump
back of a hand slower ball, full on off. Defended
full on middle, and he misses the nudge to the leg side. Hits his pad, but looks like it was bat-pad, and that saves him from being out lbw
yorker just outside off, and it's right in the blockhole. Mahmudullah can't get bat to ball, and the delivery goes into the keeper's gloves
slower ball, but a full toss on middle. Nudged to deep backward square
full on off, and he drills a drive over the bowler's head to long off
full just outside off, and he drives with the angled bat. But finds the fielder at cover. Just two off Keemo's return over
slower ball, but full on middle. Mashrafe backs away to the leg side, and then swats a straight drive for four
full just outside leg stump, and he makes room once again before drilling an inside-out drive through cover. Man in the deep, but he can't cut it off in time
slower ball on middle, and Mashrafe lifts this over Holder! Off the bat's toe end, but enough behind it to beat mid off. A hat-trick of fours
back of a length on middle, but that's one too many. Swipes at this, and the ball is mistimed over short fine leg
back of a length on middle again, but Mortaza makes room and pulls to Cottrell at deep midwicket. Fifteen off the over already
knee-high full toss on middle, and he tickles this square to deep midwicket to keep the strike
full outside off, and he laces this drive through the covers. But well stopped by cover
slower ball, but wide and full outside off. Forces Mortaza to reach at it, and he mistimes a shot to cover
full outside off, and he tries to slog a shot down the ground. Places this past Paul's left
full outside off, and he slashes hard at this. Slices a drive, but the ball goes over gully for four!
yorker just outside off, and he runs it down to third man for one
short and wide outside off, and he flat-bats a pull down the ground. Nicks the non-striker's stumps on the way to long on

improvisation! Mortaza goes really deep into his crease to try and earn a few extra seconds, and Holder bowls full outside off. Swings through the ball's line, and has enough behind his shot to beat long on!
back of a length outside off, and Mashrafe tries to pull it fine down the leg side. Connects well, but finds the fielder at short fine leg
back of a length on leg stump, and Mashrafe backs away to flat-bat a pull to wide long on
slower ball but short on middle stump. Goes over Mahmudullah's head, but the umpire says that's not a wide
full on leg, and he clips it away to deep fine leg for one
what was that?! Short ball on middle, and Mahmudullah tries to reverse-pull (yes, you read that right). He's tangled up, but manages to top-edge the shot to the keeper. Dropped though!
yorker just outside off, and the batsman can't get bat to ball
slashes and slashes hard! That cliche best describes this shot. Full outside off, but his hard followthrough of the bat takes the shot past the keeper's right for four
full on off, and he drills a drive to Paul. Stopped by him, but they still manage to steal a single
full and wide outside off, and Mahmudullah tries to chase at it. Attempts to drive over cover, but the outside edge once again takes the ball past the keeper's right
yorker just outside off, and he wedges this to short third man. Brings up Bangladesh's 250!
yorker on off, but he manages to drive it down the ground for a single. Partnership of 51 off 37 balls now
reverse pulled again! But Mortaza can't connect. The back of a length delivery goes over his bat and through to the keeper
length ball on off, and he swings across the line to deep midwicket for one
good length on leg stump, but going down the leg side
good length outside leg, and he pulls this to fine leg for a single
glanced straight to short third man! Mortaza was making room and Holder followed him. He tries to ramp this short ball over the infield, but the shot doesn't come off the bat's sweet spot
back of a length on leg stump, but going down leg. Not given a wide though as the batsman swiveled in an attempt to pull
low full toss on off, and driven to cover for a single
full outside off, but Sabbir can't lap sweep this away to the leg side. Connects well, but his front leg comes in the ball's way, and it ricochets away to the off side
full outside off, and the drive has been sliced over point to the fielder in the deep
length ball on off, and he dabs this down to third man for a single
full outside off, and he goes for a slog to the leg side. The ball isn't timed well
full outside off, but the slower ball goes under his bat and through to the keeper
starts off with the short ball. Lands on middle, and goes over Sabbir's head
yorker on leg, and he nudges this fine for a single. Wants two, but they change their mind quickly
length ball outside off, and that's been mistimed to point
good length outside off, and he backs away to flat-bat a pull to wide long on
full outside leg stump, but Mahmudullah can't flick it fine. No worries, cause it's a wide anyway
full on middle, but he comes down the ground and smashes it over long on! Classy way to get to fifty
slower ball outside off, and he clips this away to backward square leg for a single
full outside off, but his drive over extra cover doesn't come off. Takes the bat's inside edge and rolls away to the leg side
full on middle, and that's been clipped off his legs for a boundary! Whips it away behind square, and fine leg is just too fine
slower ball on off, but he picks the short length early, and swings across to the leg side. Aims at cow corner, and finds another boundary
full outside off, and his attempted slog doesn't come off. Slices this shot, and Lewis takes this skyer at point
golf ball swing! Full on middle but Mahmudullah comes down the wicket and tonks it over long on. Picks the slower ball early once again
glorious late cut! Length ball outside off, and he places this perfectly behind point for a boundary. Massive over
length ball on leg and Mosaddek backs away. Pulls down the ground to long on
back of a length on middle, and he swivels to pull. Finds fine leg
back of a length on middle, but Mosaddek swings away and finds the gap on the leg side! Beats deep midwicket to earn four
full outside leg stump, and he backs away to drill a drive to long off
back of a length on middle, and the pull is well connected! But there are two men in the deep now, so they scamper back for two
full outside leg stump, and that's been shoveled to the vacant mid-wicket region. Enough time to steal a second and Bangladesh finish on 301 for 6!
short of a length at off stump, dropped into the off side off the back foot
short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
length ball lifts up and hits the handle as he looks to get forward and defend this
length ball slanted into the corridor. Left alone
past the inside edgeas this length ball stays low. He's deep in the crease to try and defend this outside off but isn't close to connecting
nicely timed but straight to the fielder. Overpitched ball outside off and he gets his hands through this nicely
length on off stump, blocked into the off side off the front foot
steps out against  short of a length ball and watches closely to block it in the end
short of a length outside off, punched to long-off on the up
short of a length outside off, tapped to cover on the up
length ball angled in at leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
raps the pad but that's an arm ball, it's not straightening, it's hitting him in front of leg and it was delivered from wide of the crease. The lbw is turned down as Gayle misses on the flick
full outside off. Mistimed drive bounces back down the pitch off the inside half of the bat
length ball on the pads, tapped into the leg side with soft hands
slaughtered. Short of a length ball on middle stump and he has backed away very early to make room and then whacked this over the off-side infield
backs away again but this time he's forced to tap the length ball back past his partner
shot. But point leaps to his left to save three runs. Lewis likes this short and wide ball and climbs into it. It's good work from the fielder to keep that to one
length on leg stump, tapped to mid-on on he up
length and in at the stumps. Defended into the leg side
tossed up wide outside off. Beaten in flight and forced to check his shot after shaping to drive
slider at a length coming in on off stump. Blocked down the pitch
short of a length ball punched back to the bowler, who misfields and allows him a run
arm ball on leg stump, gets deep and tickles it to short fine's left off the pad
beaten. Plays inside the line of a slider in the corridor and it's past the outside edge
full on middle stump, driven firmly to mid-on
slower ball at the pads, tapped to short fine's right
length ball at off stump, blocked on the front foot
inside half as he's done by the offcutter, but he gets it past mid-on. Length ball on off and he's gone through the cover drive quickly
short ball into the stumps, stands tall and pulls to deep square
slower ball at a length outside off, cut into the covers
slider, short of a length outside off. Inside edge onto pad as he gets on the back foot to punch
full ball down leg side, can't get bat on the sweep
floated up outside off, mistimed drive to mid-off
short of a length slider down leg, can't get bat on the pull
full on off stump, punched firmly back to the bowler
length ball on leg stump, nudged to deep midwicket off the back foot

out of the ground. This length ball has landed in Gayle's arch and he's golf-swung the hell out of it! Straight over the roof behind the bowler's hand. Doesn't look like he's put in even the slightest effort in losing this ball.
outside edge past slip. This one dips on Gayle and he isn't to the pitch as he swings across the line. Holds its line outside off but it's too quick for slip
length ball on off stump, blocked down the pitch
inside edge trickles to short fine's left. Looks to pull a short ball from the stumps that hasn't quite risen
short of a length on leg stump, punched to midwicket off the back foot
slower ball on off stump, pings off the outside edge into the covers as he looks to defend
length on the stumps and he drags this straight to midwicket with an angled bat
full outside off, short stride as he looks to drive. It's aerial but it lands short of extra cover
length outside off, blocked on the front foot

misfield. That is terrible work at square leg. It's a full ball on leg and Gayle has no control as he looks to drive and gets an inside edge. It's to the fielder's left there and he just has two strides to cover. Gets there but lets it through
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, gets forward and is beaten as it spins past his forward defence

a review for lbw. Gayle shuffles slightly and looks to flick. He's struck on the pad. Remember, Mehidy is bowling around the wicket. This ball hasn't straightened - it goes with the arm. Leg stump visible as he misses this. No bat involved...and it's going down. They'll lose their review.
short of a length on off stump, punched to the bowler off the back foot
full outside off, poked to extra cover off the front foot
short ball rising up at a middle stump line. Backs away and has a hoick at this. Gets in woeful shape and is beaten

this flies into the off side off this pad as he looks to flick. Takes a couple of steps down, draws a throw which hits the stumps and deflects towards fine leg. They take the run. Third umpire called for - confirms he was in
slower ball at a length on leg stump, allows it to come on craftily tickles it past short fine
full ball down leg side, can't get bat onto it
offcutter bowled full on leg stump. Blocked off the front foot

blazed away! Mashrafe goes short and it's a bad result waiting to happen. It's an offcutter to boot. Gayle has even more time than he needs. Sits right back in the crease and slaps it flat over the extra cover boundary
length ball angled in at off stump, pushed down the pitch off the inside half
full and down leg side. Can't get the sweep away
length outside off, doesn't get to the pitch as he tries to drive. Thick inside edge to square leg
short of a length outside off, punched to extra cover off the back foot
quicker one is not picked and he just manages to get bat down in time. Length ball comes in rapidly as he gets on the back foot
short ball sliding into the corridor. Can't get the punch through the infield
length on off stump, punched to long-off off the back foot

taken. Mashrafe persists and he gets his man. Lewis has been bottled up by Bangladesh's captain and it's him who gets the breakthrough eventually. Offcutter climbs in the corridor. It's at a good length but he's stabbing at it off the back foot. Flies high to the keeper's left and he takes it easily
length and in at the stumps. Tapped into the midwicket region from the crease
length ball outside off, hangs the bat outside off and is beaten
short of a length on off stump, dropped into the off side with soft hands
inside edge as this hoops in late and skids inwards off the surface. He's not even in position to block as this pings way
slower ball on the pads and he pays. Bad end to the over. Gayle merely nudges this fine with the angle
length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
length on middle stump, pushed down the pitch off the back foot
full on off stump, driven towards long-on, but it's stopped with a dive by the bowler
length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
full outside off, shuffles across and flicks to short fine's right
length on middle stump, glanced into the leg side off the back foot
offcutter across the corridor on a length and he lets it go
inside edge onto thigh guard as he looks to close the face on this length ball which is slanting across him
short and wide outside off. Swish and miss. His feet aren't moving too well at the moment
nice looking shot. Gets off the ground and forecefully whips one to deep square, across the angle
length on middle stump, defended from the crease
short of a length outside off, defended to point with an open face
full toss outside off, driven hard, but straight to extra cover
short of a length on middle, punched to long-on off the back foot
short of a length at off stump, backs away and punches one-handed to long-off
short of a length on middle, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot

drilled over the bowler. Geez. That's barely gone ten feet up from where I'm seeing it, but it's cleared the fence. Hossain lobs one up full and Gayle gets is front leg out of the way to crash this flat
full on leg stump, flicked through square leg
length on middle stump, deep in the crease to defend down the pitch
short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs it straight to point
slower ball on a length at middle stump, rips in at him but he manages to get an inside edge on this for the single that brings up his fifty
short of a length outside off, neatly punched to sweeper cover
slower ball blocked into the leg side off the front foot
short of a length on middle stump, closes the face and taps this into the leg side off the back foot
under-edges the cut and it rolls back down the pitch. Short and wide from the bowler but it didn't rise
short of a length wide outside off and a nicely timed punch. But once again straight to the fielder at extra
length on middle stump, punched to midiwicket
short outside off, sliced into the point area with an open face
nice. Deft. Short ball sliding down leg from around the wicket and he deliberately taps this on its head past short fine as he swivels
short of a length on the stumps, nudged through midwicket off the back foot
length ball on middle, that Gayle comfortably tucks away to the leg side
quick length ball that goes down the leg side, but only just. Gayle tried to nudge it square, but misses. He smiles, because the umpire doesn't call it a wide
length ball on off again, and Gayle taps it to mid on and races off (yes, races off) for a single
full on middle, and defended straight back to Fizz off the front foot
length ball on off, and he defends it away to cover on this occasion
full on middle, and he gets inside the line of the ball to drive. Pushes to mid on eventually
stand and deliver! Half-tracker outside off from the bowler, and Gayle goes onto the back foot, and pulls this over cow corner
out of the ground! Lands in the city of Basseterre. Overpitched on middle, and Gayle opens his chest and thumps this over long on. New balls please!
good length outside off, and that's been left alone
slower through the air, and this lands outside off. Skids through and Gayle needs to adjust late onto his back foot. Eventually splices this to mid on
length ball outside off, and skidding through again. Hope misses the cut
full just outside off, and driven down the ground to long on
full just outside off, and he dabs this late to third man for a walking single
good length outside off, and he cuts it late to third man once again. Gayle walks across for one
full just outside off, and driven with the angled bat to deep point. Just a single though
full on off, and he defends with soft hands
full on leg, and he clips it away to deep midwicket for a single. Awry throw from the deep, but Mahmudullah's backing up
full on middle, and defended to the off side. He wants a single, but point intercepts
full on off, but angling across Gayle. He sticks his bat out and the ball goes just past his outside edge! So close
back of a length delivery that cramps Gayle for space. Defends it away to the off side rather uncomfortably
full on middle and leg. Gayle comes forward and defends
full outside off, and he runs this cut down to third man for a jogging single
good length outside off, and Hope gets onto the back foot, for a punch back to cover
full just outside off, and defended
overpitched on middle, and Gayle has no trouble in whipping this away to deep square leg for a single. Partnership of 50 (in 60 balls)
full on middle, and defended with soft hands to cover
full on off, and he opens his bat's face to run it down to third man
back of a length outside off, but Gayle sticks his bat out and plays it to point
back of a length outside off again, and Gayle rides the bounce to defend
short! Lands on middle, and forces Gayle to duck
length ball outside off, and this has been cut away to deep point for one
back of a length on middle, and Gayle is forced to defend off the back foot
full on leg stump, but Gayle stands tall to block off the front foot
full on middle and angling across Gayle. He sticks his bat out, trying to defend, but the ball whizzes past his bat's outside edge
full on middle, and this time it's in Gayle's arc. He smashes over Rubel's head, but straight to long on! The Bangladesh team celebrate like they've won the World Cup!
full on middle, and he defends off the front foot. But the ball takes the outside edge and goes to third man
full on middle, and he goes for a sweep. Misses, and the ball hits his front leg. Appeal for lbw turned down
full outside off, and Hetmyer takes a big stride forward to defend
good length outside off, and he goes for the cut. The ball stays low, and he misses the shot. Almost clips the outside of off stump
length ball outside off, and this one straightens after pitching. Tentatively defended
good length on middle, and he rocks back to flat-bat this down the ground to long on
full on middle, and he misses the clip off his pads. Hits his front leg but impact's outside leg
back of a length on middle, and he defends it away to cover off the back foot. They scamper across for one
good length outside off, and he punches this beautifully through the covers! Stands tall and caresses this through the gap
good length outside off, and he punches it through to the off side. Straight to cover
good length outside off, and the ball stays low! Hope's deceived by the pace too, as he plays a pull shot way too early
good length on off, and Hope misses the leg-side flick. Hits his front pad, near the knee roll, but the appeal is rather soft because of the height at impact
full on off, and Hope goes onto the back foot. Clips this away to deep midwicket
good length outside off, and defended back to the bowler
good length just outside off. He goes to the off side and defends
full on off, and defended off the front foot. Stopped by the fielder at short cover
tossed up outside off, but Hope drags a slog-sweep from outside off. Gets a lot of meat behind that shot, and that's four for West Indies
full just outside off, and defended
full on off, and he goes onto the back foot and flicks it square to the leg side
good length on middle, and fended off the back foot
full on middle, and defended off the front foot to mid off
full on off, and that's been slog-swept to the leg side. Enough time to scamper back for two
good length on middle, and that's been pulled away! Wasn't too short, but Hetmyer did well to bend his knees, ensuring he was under the ball
full outside off, and angling across the batsman. Tries to drive but misses
length ball outside off, and he runs it down to third man off the back foot
full on middle, and he takes a big stride forward to drive down to long off
full on middle, and that's been turned off his pads to the leg side
full outside off, forcing Hope to reach at it. Mistimes the drive to the off side
overpitched outside off, and Hope tries to drive through the covers once again. But finds cover point
drifting down leg, but Hope can't play it fine. Instead mistimes a shot to square leg
full on middle, and Hetmyer prefers going backwards to defend
full on off, and Hope punches this down the ground. Off the bat's inside half, though, and therefore Rubel intercepts
good length outside off, and crunched through the covers (off the back foot) to deep extra cover
good length on middle, and he inside edges this to the fine-leg boundary! Cramped for space as he attempted the punch off the back foot

good length on off, and defended off the back foot. But the ball goes past his outside edge and into the keeper's gloves. Bangladesh appeal, but not given! They don't have a review. Mashrafe thinks that was out, but alas. Replays show there was no edge
good length on middle, and he stays on the back foot, before running it down to third man
good length on middle, and defended tentatively to mid off
good length outside off, and he cuts it away to deep point for a single
uses his feet! Full on leg stump, but he comes down the ground to try and lift off. Only manages to drill this down the ground to deep midwicket
good length on middle, and angling into his body. Flicked away to square leg
flatter delivery on middle stump, but Hetmyer paddle sweeps this square to the fielder in the deep
good length outside off, and he tries to cut off the back foot. But the ball turns inwards, takes Hope's inside edge, and almost crashes into leg stump! Lucky
back of a length on middle, but Hetmyer pulls this down the ground to long on. Off the bat's inside half on this occasion
full outside off, and he carves a drive past the diving cover fielder! Uses his wrists to place this brilliantly past the infielder. Shows the class he actually possesses
good length outside off, and he punches this with the bat's open face. Straight to point
full on middle, and he mistimes the straight drive off the front foot. Once again spliced off the bat's inside half. Goes to the bowler
full just outside off, and he defends with the bat's open face. Allows Hope to run this shot down to third man
good length on off, but angling away from Hetmyer. He tried to drive square, but the ball kept moving away, eventually sneaking past the bat's outside edge as well
hits his face! Full on middle, and he tries to paddle-sweep fine. But the ball hits his glove, and then the grille of his helmet
full on middle, and worked towards the leg side
length ball on off, and he goes onto the back foot. Whips a shot off his pads to the leg side
drifting down leg, and Hetmyer goes down on one leg to paddle. Finds short fine leg
good length outside off, but straightening after pitching. He goes onto the back foot and punches to long on
full, but down the leg side. Keeper can't collect either, and short fine leg runs to his left and intercepts
good length outside off, and he walks across to the off side to cut
tossed up outside off, and Hope goes for the expansive cover drive. Times it well too, but finds the infielder
good length on off, and Hope opens his stance to work this to the leg side. Played to midwicket
good length outside off, and Hetmyer carves a cut off the back foot to the fielder in the deep

goes for the big shot! But dropped! Full outside off, and spinning away after pitching. Hope goes for the big inside-out lift over extra cover, but slices it in the air. Rubel - at long off - runs to his right to take the catch, but he fluffs it
good length on off, and he paddles this square to short fine leg
good length on off, and he punches this down the ground. But Mashrafe, at short mid on, runs to his right and stops the ball
full on middle, and going down leg. Hetmyer taps it to the leg side
quicker ball on leg stump. Hetmyer tries to place this past short fine leg, but the ball hits his pad instead
he's drifting down leg once again, and this time Hetmyer connects with the paddle shot he was attempting. Beats short fine leg, but deep square leg does well to intercept. Fifty partnership too
good length outside off, and Hetmyer cuts it off the back foot to point
stays low! Lands on middle, and Hetmyer drags a pull off the back foot to cow corner
flat on middle, and Hetmyer backs away to make some extra room. Bunts a punch to long off for a single
full on off, and he works it off his pads to the leg side with soft hands
length ball outside off, and he drags a pull to the square fielder on the leg side

tossed up just outside off, and he pushes at it with soft hands to cover. They take a quick single, and the fielder has a shy at the non-striker's stumps! He misses, and Shakib's not backing up either, so West Indies earn an extra run
low full toss just outside off, and it's been driven with the angled bat to cover point
full outside off, and that's been pushed away to the fielder at deep extra cover. Drinks as well
full on middle, and he makes some room. Punches to cover off the back foot, but finds Mehidy there
good length on leg stump, and he has no trouble in flicking the ball off his hips to square leg
straight on off, and punched back to Shakib
picked up, and deposited at the long-on boundary! Half-tracker and Hope opens his stance to muscle a pull over midwicket. Goes to the wide long-on boundary
good length on off, but angling into Hope. Fended to cover, and gets off the strike as well
punched off the back foot to cover. Can't find the gap off this full delivery
good length on leg stump, and Hope misses out on the sweep shot. Comes off his front pad, and trickles away to short third man
good length outside off, and cut away off the back foot. Only to Mahmudullah at deep cover though
full just outside off, and he defends to short cover. Enough time to scamper across for one

crashes into leg stump! Gets the big, big wicket of Shimron. It's a flat ball that lands on middle, and sneaks under his bat as he tries to pull to the leg side. The ball skids through after pitching, and that quicker delivery is just too much for Hetmyer to handle. He's gotta go
welcomed with a flat ball on leg stump, that he has no trouble punching to long on for a single
full on off, but the ball stays low. Hope defends off the bat's toe end. Played to mid on
good length outside of, but turning away after pitching. Cut to point

full on leg, and he misses the sweep. Hits his front leg and the ball trickles down to short fine leg. They take a single, and the throw misses the stumps! Chance of overthrows, but the fielder's backing up
full just outside off. Hope comes forward to defend, and squirts a shot to the leg side. Moves to 49
good length on leg,and Powell walks down the wicket. But he punches it straight to the diving midwicket fielder
uses his feet again, and this full ball is drilled down to long on for a single
full outside off, but spinning inwards sharply! Surprises Hope, but he manages to carve a punch to the off side
dropped at long on! Sabbir the guilty man this time. It's a full ball which Powell chips over the non-striker. Sabbir does the hard work, and dives forward too, but just can't hold on to the catch
tossed up on middle, and Hope flicks this past the diving midwicket fielder. Fifty for Hope!
aimed on leg stump, and shoveled to Mashrafe at midwicket. Indecision from the batsman, as they say yes-no-yes-no, and Mortaza has a shy at the non-striker's stumps. But he misses
appeal for lbw turned down! Length ball on middle, and spinning into his pads

full just outside off, and Hope drives to cover. But this time Powell is already halfway down the wicket with Hope still at the keeper's end. No chance of a single, as Mashrafe collects, lobs the ball to Mehidy, and he wastes no time in whipping the bails off
lands on off stump, and Hope goes onto the back foot to clip it square
full and wide outside off. Hope misses the square drive, but the ball finishes inside the tramlines. Dot ball
full outside off again, and cut away to point. Finds the fielder once again
full on middle, and defended to the leg side with soft hands. They walk across for one. Required-run rate over 10.50 now
length ball on off, and he muscles a punch off the back foot to the leg side
tossed up on off, and angling into Hope. He crunches a punch to the fielder at deep extra cover
thumped to the cow-corner boundary! Full on off, and he slogs across the line to deep midwicket
full just outside off, and driven away to deep extra cover. Work for Sabbir in the deep, but his diving effort ensures it's not a boundary. Every run saved counts...
full just outside off, and he pushes to cover with soft hands
back of a length on middle, and angling into his body. Tries to punch to the on side, but the ball goes through to hit his thigh pad. Mortaza appeals for lbw, but not given
rolls his fingers over this delivery. Much slower, and lands outside off. Tentatively fended away to the off side
good length outside off, and pulled over midwicket! The infielder may have gotten fingertips to it, and that saves the boundary, because the ball's pace slows down considerably. Mehidy the fielder
slower ball, full outside off. Tapped to cover off the front foot, and he'll retain the strike
good length on off, but angling across the batsman. Creams a cut shot off the back foot, but goes straight to Mehidy
full outside off, and the angle away from Powell forces him to miss the shot. Tries to drive but misses completely
slashed past the keeper! Full outside off again, and the drive takes a top edge through to the third-man boundary
good length on leg stump, but Powell comes down the wicket. Eventually tapped down the ground to long on
length ball on leg stump, but Hope walks across to the off side and whips this off his pads, and over square leg for four. Exquisite
good length outside off, but this ball stays low! Hope tries to drag a pull from outside off but misses
good length outside off, and pulled down the ground to long on
slower ball full outside off, and the drive to cover is misfielded by the infielder! Shakib the guilty man this time, but thankfully (for Bangladesh) there's someone at long off

slower ball again, and this is disguised much better. Hope flicks it away to the leg side, but the ball takes a leading edge and lands safely beyond midwicket. Excellent skill from the Bangladesh captain
good length on middle, but angling into the batsman. He mistimes a pull to the fielder in the deep, and Powell has enough time to call for the second
full outside off, and Powell's attempted slog takes the inside edge! Beats the stumps, and the keeper, but short fine leg does well to bring the ball back
full outside off, and Powell muscles a shot to long on. Uses the bottom hand to lift it over the non-striker
full outside off, but Powell already walks across to the pitch of the delivery before driving over cover. Slices this shot over the infield
full outside off, but deceived by the change-up delivery! Goes for the drive over cover, but the ball goes past his outside edge

full outside off, but Hope walks across to the off side (exposing all three stumps), trying to flick it behind square. The ball hits the inside of his bat, goes between his legs, and eventually ends up in the keeper's gloves
full outside off, and he throws his hands at it. The drive takes another top edge through to third man
takes the screws off this! How powerful was that. Just a bit too full outside off, and Powell clears his front leg before tonking this over cow corner
full outside off, and Powell misses the drive. The ball goes over the tramlines and the umpire calls wide. Mushfiqur isn't happy, probably because the batsman moved to the off side too
the extra ball goes for four! Low full toss outside off, and Powell drills this past the non-striker for a boundary. Almost takes Hope with him to the ropes too. Raw power.
holes out at deep midwicket! Shakib gets under this, and finally Bangladesh hold onto a catch. The offcutter from Mashrafe enticed Hope to go for a big shot, but the slog is not timed well enough
full on off, and Powell's attempted drive comes off the inside edge. Trickles down to deep square leg
full on off, and pushed to long on. Gets off the mark, and wants a double too, but that ain't happening
slower ball, full on off stump. Pushed down the ground again to long on, but only for a single. Bangladesh won't mind these. Not one bit
full just outside off, and Holder defends into the gap near cover to steal a single
slow and wide outside off stump. Powell drags a flat-batted shot down the ground to long on. He'll keep strike
knee-high full toss outside off, and Powell check-punches a slog over cow corner! No real followthrough of the bat. Just brute force. Excellent start to the over from West Indies
full outside of, and he misses out on this slog. Drills a shot into his own boots as the ball dribbles away to the leg side
full outside off, and the drive is sliced to Mehidy at point. Quick work from the fielder, as he has a shy at the stumps. Misses, but the quick work forces the batsmen to say no to the single
yorker outside off, and Powell's attempted jab takes the inside edge to the leg side
full outside off, and driven square off the front foot to the fielder at deep point. Just a single. Good comeback from Fizz after that six off the first ball
no he can't! Full on off, and it's in Powell's arc again. Launches this over long on, and that's another big over from Mustafizur
full on off, and that's been chipped over Powell to long on
good length outside off, and flicked off his hips to square leg
full outside off, and worked away to the leg side with soft hands. But they can collect only a single
good length outside off, and Powell uses his wrists to smother this punch to long on for one
full outside off, but Holder comes down the wicket and slogs across the line. Off the bat's toe end, and lands juuust short of Shakib at deep midwicket
good length outside off, but Powell's deceived by the change of pace. Mistimes a punch to long on and gets to fifty!
overpitched on leg stump, and he muscles a shot to short fine leg for a single. Tried to slog it over midwicket, but couldn't get the optimal connection
full outside off, and Holder is allowed to free his arms. Swings through the ball's line, but the shot goes to long on on the bounce
full on middle, and Powell clears his front leg to slog across the line. Lifts this with the use of his bottom hand, and the ball goes straight into the cow-corner boundary

good length on off, and Powell once again makes some room to free his arms. Pulled over to deep midwicket, and a diving effort in the deep may have saved a boundary. But the umpires want to have a second look. Every single run saved counts at this stage.
full on leg stump, and this time the slog goes to deep midwicket on the bounce. Sabbir the man doing the heavy lifting there. Powell's not happy
full and wide outside off. Holder does well to let it go through. One free run for West Indies
full on leg, and Holder's slog is mistimed to deep backward square leg. Eleven off the over
full on middle, and he goes for the big shot over extra cover. Can't time it well, and the ball is in the air for ages. Rubel gets under it at long off and does manage to hold on! Sends Holder home.
full on middle, and defended back to Fizz off the front foot
lucky! An excellent delivery that costs Fizz a boundary. Back of a length outside leg, and Powell tried to nudge it to the leg side. Takes a leading edge, and flies between keeper and gully!
good length ball outside leg stump, and Powell flicks this off his pads to the leg side
full outside leg stump, and he misses the paddle sweep. Hits the bat's handle and flies away to the off side instead. They appeal for lbw, but the umpire signals runs

good length on leg stump, and Powell misses the leg-side swipe. Hits his front pad, and the lbw appeal is turned down! Looked much closer, but maybe the height saved him. A chance of a run-out as well, as Mushfiqur has a shy at the stumps with Powell outside his crease. But he misses.
full outside off, and the drive is drilled to the fielder at cover. All the infielders are on the 30-yard circle
knee-high full toss but wide outside off. He swings across the line, and gets a good connection too, but the shot goes to long on on the bounce
yorker on off, and shoveled to cover. Just a single
full outside off, and the slog takes the bat's inside edge! Almost beats the keeper, but Mushfiqur sticks his left hand out and stops the ball. Saves a certain four
attempted yorker on off stump, and all Nurse can do is thump a drive down to long on
full on off, and Powell can't put this away! It was in the slot to be thumped, but the ball takes an inside edge to the leg side. Powell is disappointed, but atleast he keeps strike
over wide long on! Make that 22 off five! Full on off, and lifted into the stands. In his arc, and Powell doesn't miss out
good length on leg stump, and the pull goes to deep midwicket. No chance of a double. Gets Nurse on strike
full outside leg stump, and Nurse's wild swing doesn't make contact with the ball. It goes through to the keeper and now the equation becomes seven runs per ball.
good length outside off, and he backs away before cutting to Rubel at cover point. Rubel cartwheels and stops a certain boundary!
back of a length outside leg, and he flicks it square to deep midwicket
full on off, and Nurse brings out a front foot defence to end the series.Bangladesh win by 18 runs!
